TopicTitle: TheIlyane - A novice YouTuber with a passion for KSP..

Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbal Space Program(mers)-users/players/etc..

For some time now IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve been trying to set up a channel, and it appears to be really kicking off and IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m about to break my first few hundred subscribers, and I would like to use this thread to tell a little bit about my channel, what I do and why I love Kerbal Space Program.

IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m a space enthusiast through and through and I try to absorb every little bit of information that comes down the NASA, SpaceX, JAXA, etc. Ã¢â‚¬â€œtrain and learn as much about it all as possible, and this drew me, inevitably, to the Kerbal Space Program Ã¢â‚¬â€œ a game so wonderful in detail, feel and atmosphere (no pun intended).

IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve been working on my own series, with some normal KSP video in between, namely my series in which I take a shuttle across the stars on a nonstop trek to all the planets in the Kerbol Solar System Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and I would like to invite you, my fellow players, to follow me on this journey. WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re at episode six and weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve just embarked for our first stop: Duna and Ike.

I plan to do a variety of videoÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s, some including my own things (RL), a lot of Kerbal Space Program, and the occasional coverage of something thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s happening in the real space world (ie: launches, docking, experiments).

So, without further delay I present you the first episode (there are already six! Check my channel for the others!) and enjoy! Please feel free to use this thread for chatter, criticism, praise, discussion and everything else.. I will occasionally bump this thread for new video submissions.

Thank you for being such and excellent community, thank you for your time and thank you, Squad, for making this jewel of a game which we all play with so much passion.

TheIlyane,

Michiel van Rooijen.
